name: Split It
description:
Play in 1 of 4 game modes to match colors, create combos, and get high scores! Try not to stack them too much, or you lose! 

Don't like the normal rules? Make your own in Custom Split, a game mode exclusive to this upload!

Features a variety of different achievements which unlock new piece-sets and splitters to play with. Try and get the highest score you can, however you want!

Music was created by Keewy, and the soundtrack is available for free on bandcamp!

Want to play the original version on Android? Linked, and since it doesn't have the new features or bugfixes, it's now completely free!
